definition: to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code
bow string/string of musical instrument/watchspring/chord (segment of curve)/hypotenuse/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: The picture is more compelling with an arrow at this point.
sentences.chinese: 在这里这张图中的箭头是扣人心弦的。

sentences.english: The two finalists are well matched and it should result in a nail-biting finish to the tournament.
sentences.chinese: 两个决赛者棋鼓相当，决赛将会扣人心弦的。

sentences.english: Ms. Gillard predicted Saturday's ballot will be an 'absolute cliffhanger.'
sentences.chinese: 吉拉德预测，周六的投票毫无疑问将“扣人心弦”。

sentences.english: It's just these heart-thrilling chapters that brought his work world renown.
sentences.chinese: 正因这些扣人心弦的篇章才使得他的作品举世闻名。

sentences.english: Expect another tightly plotted film from Hong Kong's master of stylish thrillers.
sentences.chinese: 期待香港这位惊悚片大师又一部扣人心弦的力作吧。

sentences.english: Or even more exciting, have you ever fallen “head over heels” in love?
sentences.chinese: 或者更加扣人心弦，“从头到脚”完全沉入其中？

sentences.english: Dreaming about being an actress, is more exciting then being one.
sentences.chinese: 作梦关于是女演员，是更加扣人心弦然后是一个。

sentences.english: The play was so gripping that the audience quickly-fied with the actors.
sentences.chinese: 那出戏如此扣人心弦，以致观众很快和演员融为一体。

sentences.english: Works bizarre plot twists and turns, twists and turns, exciting.
sentences.chinese: 作品情节曲折离奇，一波三折，扣人心弦。

sentences.english: The play was so gripping that the audience quickly identified with the actors.
sentences.chinese: 那出戏如此扣人心弦，以致观众很快和演员融为一体。

sentences.english: La Scala del Calcio will be packed for what is one of the most-eagerly awaited encounters of the season.
sentences.chinese: 米兰将期待本赛季最扣人心弦的一场对决。

sentences.english: Find out in this heart-pounding hidden-object puzzle adventure.
sentences.chinese: 请在这场扣人心弦的解谜冒险中找到答案。

sentences.english: The thrilling semi-finals set the stage for what should be a great game.
sentences.chinese: 半决赛尚且激动人心，决赛将更扣人心弦了。

sentences.english: Simon Cabaret the most exciting place to be on the Andaman Gulf .
sentences.chinese: 西蒙余兴节目最扣人心弦的地方是在安达曼海湾。

definition: each new high point replaced by another/(of a movie etc) one climax after another
shaking one to the core/extremely disturbing/hair-raising (idiom)
soul-stirring (of drama, poem or artwork)/heart-rending/deeply moving
shaking one to the core (idiom); extremely disturbing/shattering/hair-raising
closely linked with one another/interlocked/to interrelate
lit. blood vessels swell wide (idiom)/fig. one's blood runs quicker/to be excited
